name: Zbala Shop
description:
Download the game for accurate animation, audio and subtitles. 

=======================================================

Zbala Shop ? 

A game has based on our wild imagination featured in our dreams.     

=======================================================

Controls :

Movement: WASD / Arrows

 Attack : Q / 1 / 2 /3                       

======================================================= 

Rules :

-DON'T DIE and good luck with the weapons .

-Any card the player play will be added to the field.

-Each player has to play a card such that the sum of total cards in their side of the field is higher than the opponent to continue the game.

-Once the player the sum is lower than the opponent it considers as a lose.

=======================================================
